1050480.name: DC Universe Online™ - Episode 34 : Justice League Dark
1050480.description:
An ancient evil magic from another plane has surfaced in Episode 34: Justice League Dark. A daemonic threat looms over Gotham City. Join Constantine, Zatanna, Shazam, and the Justice League Dark to stop the invasion before it's too late!

Justice League Dark features a new 2-player Duo [JLD: Pub Crawl], Open World Missions [JLD: Chaos Gotham], 4-player Alert [JLD: Darkness Rising], and two 8-player Raids [JLD: Fellowship of the Arcane & JLD: Shattered Gotham]. Both Raids have Elite versions. The episode is free to access for Members or available for purchase in the in-game Marketplace.

Otherworldly Locations – Visit mystifying locations like Limbo Town, the Rock of Eternity, the House of Mystery, and more!

Iconic Characters - Featuring new and returning heroes and villains like Zatanna, John Constantine, Mordru, Doctor Fate, Batwoman, Felix Faust, and Shazam.

Event & Episode - Justice League Dark is a large-scale episode, with level-agnostic event versions of content available to all players for a limited time.

New Rewards – Including an A.R.G.U.S. Operative gear style inspired by Steve Trevor and the Son of Belial gear style inspired by Etrigan.
